articles.description: The Renaissance Festival is open Saturdays and Sundays starting this coming weekend, Aug. 19, through Oct. 1.
articles.content:
After years of traffic backups at the Minnesota Renaissance Festival, a new plan has been announced.
After months of back and forth, Scott County commissioners decided in March to approve the event’… [+2123 chars]

articles.title: Alec Baldwin could be charged again in 'Rust' shooting after analysis finds trigger was pulled - New York Post
articles.description: Experts in ballistics and forensic testing based in Arizona and New Mexico released a report examining the revolver used on set and markings it left on a spent cartridge.
